actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (Subsequently: Energy and Natural Resources).
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources with amendment, S. Rept. 95-516.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs discharged in House.
Measure passed House, amended, in lieu of H.R. 10679.
Senate agreed to House amendments with an amendment.

official_title: An Act to amend the boundary of Cibola National Forest, designate an intended wilderness area, and for other purposes.

summary.as: Senate agreed to House amendment with amendment
summary.text: (Senate agreed to House amendments with an amendment) Modifies the exterior boundary of the Cibola National Forest, New Mexico to include additional acreage. Conditions the inclusion of such land upon the city of Albuquerque acquiring a certain tract. Provides that any lands owned by the United States in the described tracts, or any lands acquired by the Secretary of Interior and tranferring to the Secretary of Agriculture, shall be administered in accordance with the laws, rules, and regulations applicable to the National Forest System. Authorizes appropriations, not to exceed $12,000,000, from the Land and Water Conservation Fund for acquisition of the described lands.

titles.title: A bill to enlarge the boundary of the Cibola National Forest.
An Act to amend the boundary of Cibola National Forest, designate an intended wilderness area, and for other purposes.
